author: Chris Moody, Michael Learmonth
title: Most Brown and Black Americans Are Exposing Themselves to Coronavirus for a Paycheck
description: Among the American workforce, just 16.2 percent of Hispanic workers and 19.7 percent of black Americans are able to work from home, while about 30 percent of whites and 37 percent of Asian-Americans can.
content:
Each day, Bettie Douglas, a food service worker at a McDonalds restaurant in St. Louis, Missouri, makes an agonizing choice: Go in to work and risk exposure to COVID-19, or lose out on a paycheck she needs to support her family. 
 At 62, Douglas is at high r… [+5000 chars]
